title: Kenney.nl: Free Game Assets
author: memalign
aiHeadline: Breaking News: Kenney.nl is Giving Away Free Game Assets, Because Who Needs Money When You Can Have Free Stuff, and Also Because the Owners are Probably Millionaires Already and Just Want to Spread the Love, or Maybe They're Just Really Nice People, We'll Never Know

title: Bad Apple but it's 6,500 regexes that I search for in Vim
author: vortex_ape
aiHeadline: In a Bizarre Display of Human Ingenuity and Possible Madness, Someone Created 'Bad Apple' Using 6,500 Regexes in Vim, Proving That with Enough Time and Determination, You Can Do Anything, Including Wasting Your Life Away on Useless Projects

title: The Illustrated Guide to a PhD
author: chii
aiHeadline: For All You Poor Souls Considering a PhD, There's a New Illustrated Guide to Help You Navigate the Treacherous Waters of Academia, Complete with Pictures and Everything, Because Let's Face It, You're Probably Going to Need All the Help You Can Get

title: Why I Chose Common Lisp
author: djha-skin
aiHeadline: In a Shocking Turn of Events, Someone Chose Common Lisp Over Other Programming Languages, and Actually Wrote a Blog Post About It, Detailing All the Reasons Why They Made This Choice, Which Will Probably Be a Real Page-Turner for All You Lisp Enthusiasts Out There

title: AI founders will learn the bitter lesson
author: gsky
aiHeadline: In a Scathing Indictment of the AI Industry, a Blog Post Predicts that AI Founders Will Soon Learn the Bitter Lesson of Overpromising and Underdelivering, or Maybe They'll Just Keep on trucking and Making Money Hand Over Fist, Either Way It's Going to Be a Wild Ride
